# dokploy_ai_models (Data Source)

Fetches available models from an AI provider. Useful for discovering which models are available before creating an AI configuration.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API key for authenticating with the AI provider.
- `api_url` (String) The API endpoint URL for the AI provider (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1).

### Read-Only

- `models` (Attributes List) List of available models from the AI provider. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--models))

<a id="nestedatt--models"></a>
### Nested Schema for `models`

Read-Only:

- `created` (Number) Unix timestamp when the model was created.
- `id` (String) The model identifier (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-4o).
- `object` (String) The object type (usually 'model').
- `owned_by` (String) The organization that owns the model.
